scripts.gcloud:build: npm run clean &&  tsc && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/${GCLOUD_PROJECT_ID}/accessbot
scripts.gcloud:deploy: npm run gcloud:build && gcloud run deploy --image gcr.io/${GCLOUD_PROJECT_ID}/accessbot --platform managed --set-env-vars SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET=${SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET},SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=${SLACK_BOT_TOKEN},NEW_RELIC_LINKS="${NEW_RELIC_LINKS}"
